snippet: The president of Turkey is weakening the fight against the Islamic State by engaging in cynical political calculations.
abstract: Editorial condemns Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan for failing to take action against Islamic State extremists besieging town of Kobani, Syria, and its Kurdish population; holds by remaining passive, Erdogan is seeking to weaken Kurds and force United States to help him oust Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad; contends Erdogan thus is enabling Islamic State extremists, enraging Kurds in Turkey and threatening 50-plus-nation coalition United States has assembled.
lead_paragraph: The president of Turkey is weakening the fight against the Islamic State by engaging in cynical political calculations.

headline.seo: Turkey’s Refusal to Fight ISIS Hurts the Kurds

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
